question: I have been hot my entire life. Put me in water or in a freezer for days and I will still be hot. My red color should tell you but don’t be deceived, even when I’m green, I’m still hot. What am I?
I am a rare case where today comes before yesterday. What am I?
What breaks on the water but never on land?
There are 125 sheep and 5 dogs in a flock. How old is the shepherd?
